titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the employment status of certain fishermen, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

bill.summary: 5/20/1994--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code and title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to revise the employment tax treatment of certain crew members on fishing vessels with a crew of ten or fewer individuals. Requires certain persons engaged in the trade or business of purchasing fish for resale to file information returns with respect to such purchases.
